3082.name: Warden's Mail
3082.description:
+50 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 10% for 1 seconds.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
3082.plaintext: Slows Attack Speed of enemy champions when receiving basic attacks
3082.sanitizedDescription: +50 Armor UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 10% for 1 seconds. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

3089.description:
+120 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 30%.
3089.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
3089.sanitizedDescription: +120 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 30%.

3087.name: Statikk Shiv
3087.description:
+40% Attack Speed
+20% Critical Strike Chance
+6% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive: Grants Static Charges upon moving or attacking. At 100 Charges, basic attacking expends all Charges to deal 100 bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit (this damage can critically strike).
3087.plaintext: Movement builds charges that release chain lightning on basic attack
3087.sanitizedDescription: +40% Attack Speed +20% Critical Strike Chance +6% Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive: Grants Static Charges upon moving or attacking. At 100 Charges, basic attacking expends all Charges to deal 100 bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit (this damage can critically strike).

3086.name: Zeal
3086.description:
+20% Attack Speed
+10% Critical Strike Chance
+5% Movement Speed
3086.plaintext: Slight bonuses to Critical Strike Chance, Movement Speed and Attack Speed
3086.sanitizedDescription: +20% Attack Speed +10% Critical Strike Chance +5% Movement Speed

3085.name: Runaan's Hurricane (Ranged Only)
3085.description:
+70% Attack Speed

UNIQUE Passive: When basic attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target, each dealing 10 (+50% of Attack Damage) physical damage. These bolts apply on-hit effects.
3085.plaintext: Ranged attacks fire two bolts at nearby enemies
3085.sanitizedDescription: +70% Attack Speed UNIQUE Passive: When basic attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target, each dealing 10 (+50% of Attack Damage) physical damage. These bolts apply on-hit effects.

3084.name: Overlord's Bloodmail
3084.description:
+850 Health

UNIQUE Passive: Upon champion kill or assist, restores 200 Health over 5 seconds.
3084.plaintext: Restores Health on kill or assist
3084.sanitizedDescription: +850 Health UNIQUE Passive: Upon champion kill or assist, restores 200 Health over 5 seconds.

3083.name: Warmog's Armor
3083.description:
+1000 Health

UNIQUE Passive: Restores 1% of maximum Health every 5 seconds.
3083.plaintext: Grants massive Health and Health Regen
3083.sanitizedDescription: +1000 Health UNIQUE Passive: Restores 1% of maximum Health every 5 seconds.

3093.name: Avarice Blade
3093.description:
+10% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive - Avarice: +3 Gold per 10 seconds
UNIQUE Passive - Greed: Grants 2 Gold upon killing a unit.

May be bought with another Gold Income item
3093.plaintext: Grants gold over time and additional gold on kill
3093.sanitizedDescription: +10% Critical Strike Chance UNIQUE Passive - Avarice: +3 Gold per 10 seconds UNIQUE Passive - Greed: Grants 2 Gold upon killing a unit. May be bought with another Gold Income item

3092.name: Frost Queen's Claim
3092.description:
+50 Ability Power
+10 Mana Regen per 5 seconds
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Spells and basic attacks against champions or buildings deal 15 additional damage and grant 10 Gold. This can occur up to three times every 30 seconds.
UNIQUE Active: Fires an ice lance that explodes dealing 50 (+5 per champion level) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing their Movement Speed by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds. (60 second cooldown.)

Limited to 1 Gold Income item
3092.plaintext: Chills target area, damaging and slowing enemies caught in the path or explosion
3092.sanitizedDescription: +50 Ability Power +10 Mana Regen per 5 seconds +10% Cooldown Reduction +2 Gold per 10 seconds UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Spells and basic attacks against champions or buildings deal 15 additional damage and grant 10 Gold. This can occur up to three times every 30 seconds. UNIQUE Active: Fires an ice lance that explodes dealing 50 (+5 per champion level) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing their Movement Speed by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds. (60 second cooldown.) Limited to 1 Gold Income item

3091.name: Wit's End
3091.description:
+50% Attack Speed
+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 42 bonus magic damage on hit.
UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks steal 5 Magic Resist from the target on hit (stacks up to 5 times.)
3091.plaintext: Deals bonus magic damage on basic attacks
3091.sanitizedDescription: +50% Attack Speed +25 Magic Resist UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 42 bonus magic damage on hit. UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks steal 5 Magic Resist from the target on hit (stacks up to 5 times.)

3090.description:
+100 Ability Power
+45 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 25%
UNIQUE Active: Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (90 second cooldown).
3090.plaintext: Massively increases Ability Power and can be activated to enter stasis
3090.name: Wooglet's Witchcap
3090.sanitizedDescription: +100 Ability Power +45 Armor UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 25% UNIQUE Active: Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (90 second cooldown).

3098.description:
+10 Ability Power
+5 Mana Regen per 5 seconds
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Spells and basic attacks against champions or buildings deal 15 additional damage and grant 10 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds. Killing a minion disables this passive for 12 seconds.

Limited to 1 Gold Income item
3098.plaintext: Grants gold when you damage an enemy with a Spell or Attack

3097.description:
+175 Health
+8 Health Regen per 5 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 200 Health. Killing a minion heals you and the nearest allied champion for 50 Health and grants them kill Gold.

These effects require a nearby allied champion. Recharges every 30 seconds. Max 3 charges.

Limited to 1 Gold Income item
3097.plaintext: Periodically kill enemy minions to heal and grant gold to a nearby ally
3097.name: Targon's Brace
3097.sanitizedDescription: +175 Health +8 Health Regen per 5 seconds UNIQUE Passive - Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 200 Health. 3096.description:
+5 Health Regen per 5 seconds
+5 Mana Regen per 5 seconds
+10 Movement Speed
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Being near a minion death without dealing the killing blow grants 3 Gold and 5 Health.

Limited to 1 Gold Income item

3406.description:
UNIQUE Active - Sweeping Lens: Reveals and disables nearby invisible traps and invisible wards for 4 seconds in a small radius (90 second cooldown). Active upgrades at 6 Trophies.

UNIQUE Passive - Mementos of the Hunt: Rengar collects trophies when killing Champions and gains bonus effects based on how many trophies he has. Kills and assists grant 1 trophy.

3 Trophies: Rengar gains 25 Movement Speed whilst out of combat or in brush.
6 Trophies: Increases the range of Rengar's Leap by 125.
12 Trophies: Thrill of the Hunt's duration is increased by 5 seconds.
20 Trophies: Thrill of the Hunt's Movement Speed while stealthed is doubled.

+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Active: Shield target ally for 10% of your maximum Health for 4 seconds. After 4 seconds, the target explodes dealing 100% of their total Attack Damage plus 30% of their Ability Power as magic damage in an area. (60 second cooldown)

Limited to 1 Gold Income item
